title: HSBC appoints Georges Elhedery as group CEO starting Sept. 2
content: Elhedery, who is the current chief financial officer, will replace outgoing head Noel Quinn in September.
summary: Elhedery, who is the current chief financial officer, will replace outgoing head Noel Quinn in September.

title: ASML beats quarterly earnings expectations as the key chip firm's bookings pick up
content: ASML reported second-quarter earnings and sales that beat forecasts as it continues to see a recovery in demand for its machines that are required to make the world's most advanced chips.

title: As Gen Zers opt for astrology to pick stocks, experts warn it's 'neither optimal nor ideal'

title: ‘I see them the whole time’: The problem of fakes in the art market

title: This 28-year-old raised $20 million for his mental health startup. His No. 1 advice? 'Be a bit delusional'

title: Money launderers are increasingly turning to crypto to conceal flow of funds, Chainalysis says
content: The report said these criminals are using crypto because crypto is "cross-border, virtually instant, and generally inexpensive to transact."
